title: David Anointed King
summary: God sends Samuel to Bethlehem to anoint a new king. David, the youngest son of Jesse, is chosen. Though young and unknown, he is filled with God’s Spirit. He later enters Saul’s service as a musician to soothe the king’s troubled spirit.

faq.question: Why did God reject Saul as king?
faq.answer: Because of his repeated disobedience to God’s commands.

faq.question: How did David enter Saul’s service?
faq.answer: He was brought in to play the harp and calm Saul’s tormenting spirit.
